name: Pulsating Witch
title: Lisa: Pulsating Witch
desc: As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...
in_play_description: After you switch to Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
After you switch to Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
